meanings: oppose, stand against, stand up to, (어려움·문제 등에) face
challenge fate in a life-or-death situation

vlive.korean: [맞서 싸워라] - 교육생, 할 수 있습니다 알겠습니까? - 네 알겠습니다! [Fight] - You can do it. Do you hear me? - Yes sir! 듣기 View video V Special : [Full] MBC <진짜 사나이 300> 제작발표회 생중계
vlive.english: [Fight] - You can do it. Do you hear me? - Yes sir!

vlive.korean: 그리고 Nimi Kim씨가 맞서 싸울 예정입니다. And Nimi Kim will fight against him. 듣기 View video QUEEN : 제 1회 퀸씨배 인디알까기 최강자전 3화 <4강전 A조>
vlive.english: And Nimi Kim will fight against him.

vlive.korean: 지금의 고민과 맞서 부딪쳐봤으면 좋겠어요. Don't be afraid to face the confusion and difficulty. 듣기 View video GAVYNJ : GavyNJ_TV
vlive.english: Don't be afraid to face the confusion and difficulty.

vlive.korean: 우리랑 맞서 싸운다고? - F4랑 맞서 싸우는 잡초걸이라고. Confront us? - I said she's a strong girl who confronts the F4. 듣기 View video miss A : 민영의 꽃보다 남자 The Musical 비하인드!
vlive.english: Confront us? - I said she's a strong girl who confronts the F4.

vlive.korean: 끝까지 살아남고 에이리언에 맞서 싸우는 역할이잖아요. Kinda making it to the end and fighting back. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : 마이클 패스벤더 X 캐서린 워터스턴 <에이리언: 커버넌트> V라이브 ' V LIVE'
vlive.english: Kinda making it to the end and fighting back.
